ygData.subject: RE: NPC Bard in Rathe Mt
ygData.msgSnippet: I could totally see the item as a component in that quest, but honestly - won t believe anything anyone says about FA until I see it in someone s hands. Many
ygData.messageBody:
I could totally see the item as a component in that quest, but honestly -
won't believe anything anyone says about FA until I see it in someone's
hands. Many people have replied already stating they think the bard I'm
talking about is the GM driven bard that's singing about Kunark. Maybe. I
dunno.

Sartori D'Elsiraad <Legion>
50th Bard on Veeshan


>From: "Perhaps a Princess..." <sarah@...>
